overview: After the alien abduction in episode 6, we thought the Potts family had seen it all. But now, just as their thrown into the world of tabloid television and yellow journalism, they discover something else Hollywood is known for: Bloodsuckers! And we don`t mean producers, or casting agents. We mean vampires! It`s the latest installment in the biggest series of the year, Stardust, Michael Zen`s satrical tribute to everything Hollywood and everything porn. Sit back, relax, and enjoy an episode you can really sink your teeth into!
tagline: They Only Come Out At Night
title: Stardust 7
